meanings.definition: A material made from the skin of a sheep or goat and used as a writing surface.
meanings.sent1: The ancient scroll was written on parchments.
meanings.sent2: The scribe carefully inscribed the important message on parchments.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat thought the parchments were a great place to nap.
meanings.sent4: Her words were like delicate parchments, carrying the weight of history.
meanings.sent5: The smell of old parchments filled the room, transporting me to another time.

meanings.sent1: The royal decree was written on parchments.
meanings.sent2: The library housed many valuable parchments from centuries ago.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat knocked over the pile of parchments, causing chaos.
meanings.sent4: His promises were as fragile as parchments in a storm.
meanings.sent5: The teacher handed out the parchments, each holding a piece of knowledge.
